dict.acceptation: 分布广的；普遍的；广泛应用；普及的；

sent.orig: We are witnessing widespread adoption of GPS with an equivalently widespread range of accuracy requirements.
sent.trans: 我们正处在广泛的采用GPS和广泛范围的精度要求设置。

sent.orig: Moreover, Hizbullah enjoys widespread support in the south.
sent.trans: 更有甚者，真主党在南部受到广泛支持。

sent.orig: The age-old Kungfu for bodybuilding and self-defense has gained widespread popularity in its history.
sent.trans: 在历史上用于健身、自卫的古老功夫得到了广泛的喜爱。

sent.orig: Even our conservative calculations project widespread structural damage.
sent.trans: 根据我们的保守估计，也会造成大面积的结构损伤。

sent.orig: The phenomena of alienation are widespread. Sports are also alienating.
sent.trans: 异化现象普遍存在，体育运动也不例外。
